alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 5:59PM CDT until April 20 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCLENNAN...NORTHEASTERN BELL AND FALLS COUNTIES... At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lott, or near Marlin, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Robinson, Marlin, Mart, Rosebud, Riesel, Lott, Golinda, Hallsburg, Lake Creek Lake, Chilton, Wilson, Barclay, Mooreville, Reagan, Asa, Perry, Terrys Chapel, Highbank, Pleasant Grove and Satin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
